content.text: Match ends, Wolverhampton Wanderers 0, Chelsea 2.
Second Half ends, Wolverhampton Wanderers 0, Chelsea 2.
Attempt missed. Nathaniel Chalobah (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Danny Batth.
Goal!  Wolverhampton Wanderers 0, Chelsea 2. Diego Costa (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
Attempt missed. Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Matt Doherty.
Offside, Chelsea. N'Golo Kanté tries a through ball, but Victor Moses is caught offside.
Substitution, Chelsea. Ruben Loftus-Cheek replaces Eden Hazard.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Romain Saiss.
Attempt blocked. Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Attempt missed. Romain Saiss (Wolverhampton Wanderers) left footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right.
Substitution, Wolverhampton Wanderers. Connor Ronan replaces Jón Dadi Bödvarsson.
Substitution, Wolverhampton Wanderers. Romain Saiss replaces George Saville.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).
George Saville (Wolverhampton Wanderers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
